attributes.action: Name the next UK storm Gerald.
attributes.additional_details: Because we are British and love a bit of banter.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about naming storms are a matter for the Met Office, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out more about how storms are named here: https://www.metoffice.gov.uk/weather/warnings-and-advice/uk-storm-centre/index
